title: Saudi corruption purge winds down but mysteries remain
text:
Saudi corruption purge winds down but mysteries remain Monday, January 29, 2018 - 02:18 
Saudi Arabia’s stock market celebrated the release of some of the kingdom’s top businessmen from detention on Sunday but the after-effects of a purge of the business elite may last for years, deterring private investment.   
Saudi Arabia’s stock market celebrated the release of some of the kingdom’s top businessmen from detention on Sunday but the after-effects of a purge of the business elite may last for years, deterring private investment.  //reut.rs/2DKC8Nz
